name: Free Online Excel Merger - ATools
description: Free online Excel merger: merge multiple .xlsx/.xls into one workbook, keep sheets or merge into a single sheet. Runs locally.
seoDescription: Free online Excel merger to combine multiple Excel files (.xlsx/.xls). Choose to keep each sheet (appended and renamed) or merge all data into a single sheet with source columns. Everything runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.

ui.hint: Merge multiple Excel files and export a combined workbook (local only, no uploads).
ui.modeKeepSheets: Keep sheets (append into a new workbook with renamed sheets)
ui.modeSingleSheet: Merge into one sheet (append rows and add source columns)
ui.note: Note: complex formatting and cross-sheet formulas may not be fully preserved.
